      public void startGame()

    • getInputFromPlayer

      private int getInputFromPlayer(ClientHandler client, String message)
      Util method to take integer input from player. Number cannot be lower than 0
      Parameters:
      client - client from whom input will be taken
      message - message to send while asking for input
      Returns:
      integer

    • firstRound

      public void firstRound(Logger logger)
      This is the first round of the game. Firstly, game checks how many players has left in. Then player broadcasts that it is his turn now. First player has 3 options: He can check, rise or fold. If he checks he doesn't add any money to the pool. For player to have ability to check it is required first player to check. If first player rises or folds next players can't check. If player rises, he has bet current stake. If player folds, he no longer participates in a game. When every player has taken an action the game moves to second round.
      Parameters:
      logger - just to log some messages to server

    • switchResponse

      private void switchResponse(ClientHandler clientHandler, int response, boolean canNextPlayerCheck, ArrayList<Player> hasToCall, Logger logger)
      Util method to perform action depending on player's response
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - current player
      response - response
      canNextPlayerCheck - used in playerChecks
      hasToCall - used in playerRises, playerChecks
      logger - logger to log some messages to server

    • actionWhenPlayerHasToCall

      private void actionWhenPlayerHasToCall(ClientHandler clientHandler, ArrayList<Player> hasToCall, boolean canNextPlayerCheck, Logger logger)
      This method is called when one of the players has risen the stake and hence other players has to call, rise, or fold
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - client that has to take an action
      hasToCall - arraylist of clients that has to take an action. Passed just to delete player who has taken an action
      canNextPlayerCheck - boolean that determinate if this player can check
      logger - logger to log some messages to the server

    • playerChecks

      private void playerChecks(ClientHandler clientHandler, boolean allowedToCheck, ArrayList<Player> hasToCall, Logger logger)
      Called when player checks
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - client who checks
      allowedToCheck - boolean that determinate if player can do this
      hasToCall - used in switchResponse method
      logger - used in switchResponse method

    • playerRises

      private void playerRises(ClientHandler clientHandler, ArrayList<Player> hasToCall, boolean canNextPlayerCheck, Logger logger)
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - client who rises
      hasToCall - arraylist of clients who will have to call, rise or fold after this player rises
      canNextPlayerCheck - used in switchResponse method
      logger - used in switchResponse method

    • playerCalls

      private void playerCalls(ClientHandler clientHandler, Logger logger)
      Called when player calls
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - client who calls
      logger - logger to log some messages to the server

    • secondRound

      public void secondRound(Logger logger) throws IOException
      Second round of the game. Firstly, game checks if everyone but one player folded. If so the left one is the winner. Otherwise players can exchange their cards and then take an action.
      Parameters:
      logger - logger to log some messages to the server
      Throws:
      IOException - when

    • getIndexesAsArrayList

      private ArrayList<Integer> getIndexesAsArrayList(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Called when player want to exchange his cards
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - client who want to exchange
      Returns:
      arraylist of integers representing cards to exchange

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(ClientHandler client, Logger logger)
      Called when player folds. Broadcasts message, who has folded and logs int to the server
      Parameters:
      client - client who folds
      logger - server loger

    • calculateWhoWins

      public int calculateWhoWins()
      For every player evaluates his score, compares to other players and returns winner
      Returns:
      index of winner

    • isFlush

      private boolean isFlush(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      Checks if there is a flush
      Parameters:
      cards - cards to check
      Returns:
      true when there is a flush, false otherwise

    • isStraight

      private boolean isStraight(int[] ranks)
      Checks if there is a straight
      Parameters:
      ranks - cards to check
      Returns:
      true when there is a straight, false otherwise

    • topStraightValue

      private int topStraightValue(int[] ranks)
      Called with isStraight. Used to determinate 'power' of a straight. Straight from ten to ace is the strongest one.
      Parameters:
      ranks - cards which values will be taken
      Returns:
      'power' of a straight

    • evaluate

      private ArrayList<Integer> evaluate(int[] ranks, int sameCards, int sameCards2, int smallGroupRank, int largeGroupRank, boolean straight, boolean flush, int topStraightValue)
      evaluates
      Parameters:
      ranks - cards to evaluate
      sameCards - number representing if there is a pair or three/four of a kind
      sameCards2 - number representing if there is a second pair or three/four of a kind
      smallGroupRank - rank of pair or three/four of a kind
      largeGroupRank - rank of second pair or three/four of a kind
      straight - boolean
      flush - boolean
      topStraightValue - 'power' of a flush
      Returns:
      Total score of cards i player's hand as an arraylist

    • selectBiggestScore

      private int selectBiggestScore(Map<Integer,ArrayList<Integer>> playersHands)
      Calculates which player has the biggest score
      Parameters:
      playersHands - Map with player's id as a key and arraylist of his score as a value
      Returns:
      id of player

    • compare

      public int compare(ArrayList<Integer> currentPlayersCards, int[] previousPlayersCards)
      Util method to compare players' 'hands'
      Parameters:
      currentPlayersCards - cards of current player
      previousPlayersCards - values of previous player's cards
      Returns:
      1 if currently tested player has better cards, -1 when cards are worse, 0 if they are equal

    • showWinner

      public void showWinner()
      Broadcasts who win

    • takeResponse

      private boolean takeResponse(ArrayList<Integer> responses)
      take response from every client and evaluates if everyone agreed
      Parameters:
      responses - arraylist to store responses
      Returns:
      true when everyone agrees, false otherwise

    • playAgain

      public boolean playAgain()
      asks players if they want to play again and takes responses
      Returns:
      true if everyone has agreed, false otherwise

    • clearHandsAndCash

      public void clearHandsAndCash()
      Removes Card of players' hands and cash from previous game
